title: Laqê
description: A land situated on the middle Euphrates, to north and west of the kingdom of Suhu and to the south of the land Bit-Halupê. Eleven of its cities are mentioned in Assyrian inscriptions of the first millennium B.C.

properties.description: Estimated, representative centerpoint based on location of Laqê shown in the Helsinki Atlas of the Ancient Near East in the Neo-Assyrian Period and in Bagg 2017 (RGTC 7/2-2).
properties.title: Representative centerpoint of Laqê
